body_html:
Looks like with the update to LD_LIBRARY_PATH error mode has changed to CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM. When searching through old issues, it looks like the cause of this error is using TF built with another cudnn version. based on your comments, if you built on the same machine as you are runningg this should not be the case.
By any chance, do you have multiple versions of cudnn installed?

body:
Looks like with the update to `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` error mode has changed to `CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM`. When searching through old issues, it looks like the cause of this error is using TF built with another cudnn version. based on your comments, if you built on the same machine as you are runningg this should not be the case.
By any chance, do you have multiple versions of cudnn installed?
